nodes.text: Star Wars: The Story of Darth Vader (2015)

Star Wars: The Story of Darth Vader is a canon DK Readers Level 3 title that traces the rise, fall, and redemption of Darth Vader through the Star Wars film saga. It is a reissue of the 2008 Star Wars Legends title of the same name by author Catherine Saunders, with sixteen pages of additional content planned and edited by Anant Sagar, and written by Tori Kosara. The updated edition was released on September 1, 2015.
The book was reissued as part of the Learn to Read with Star Wars: Darth Vader Level 3 box set on December 12, 2017.

Star Wars: The Story of Darth Vader combines DK's new three-level reading scheme with the successful Star Wars brand, and will help children learn how to read - and learn to love reading. For children who are "Starting to Read Alone" developing skills to read confidently, fluently and with good understanding. Find out how a young Anakin Skywalker struggled with the Force and eventually turned to the Dark Side and became Darth Vader.
The book uses an image of a Star Destroyer from Star Wars: Incredible Cross-Sections.
